name: jesseadam
text: I have actually used a similar excuse, because of this strip, & it worked! Thanks, Onstad!

name: mrsmuckles
text: A comment left by mrsmuckles was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by lamboyster, littlecat, Thorfinn, tttt, Jesler729, sevenarts, DiamondMonster, SSDDR, Ariamaki, odei, mortshire, Girdag, MortisInvictus, retardedgenius, lk, foetus_punch, DanS, werthog42, El_Geeko, Wildo12, Ikrizzle, Aerys, Dainbramage, morbo)

name: catachresis
text: mrsmuckles, I like that you are enthusiastic, but every comment I have seen you make is a repeated line from the strip. Please, dude.

name: morbo
text: Perhaps he is quoting lines from the strip so people will find the appropriate strip when they search for it?

name: mrsmuckles
text: A comment left by mrsmuckles was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by lamboyster, doinkydoink, littlecat, Crowpaw, EM2, tttt2, El_Geeko, Wildo12, Shinkicka)

name: thesoulbear
text: You're seven dollars! Yes you are! Yes you ARE!

name: boredom_man
text: My mother knew that I would be seven dollars some day!

name: _pink
text: Your MOM was seven dollars!

name: mangtastic
text: His mom bought me dinner last night.

name: puguglypress
text: Man i paid like ten, fuck...

name: mal3
text: Your mom that I...BONED?

name: gunsofray
text: you have helped me many a time, good sir.

name: omegatron
text: http://www.ohnorobot.com/index.pl?comic=636

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by littlecat, riotdejaneiro, wildcat, kenthegod, fancypants, aHatOfPig)

name: rowboat
text: Face it, if everyone on here stopped just quoting lines from the strip, these message boards would be an average of, like, five comments long. And four of the five that would be left would be all, "I totally use (insert line of dialogue from any given strip here) in my everyday conversation! It's so funny of me to do that!"

name: zapatos
text: I have absorbed much of Beef's vernacular through the study of this medium.  However I don't find it humorous.  It is somewhat useful, sets me apart from the crowd.  Also moving my chair three feet obtains a similar effect.

name: dougthehead
text: Seven dollars, it must be said, is most definitely not class money.

name: vondangerous
text: I win seven dollars all the time.  It's nice to see my history come to life.

name: catachresis
text:
I have made the same face as Ray's 3rd panel face a lot of times.
Hangovers.

name: rizzle
text: It's the "I thought it was my alarm going off but it was my phone and the guy i was drinking with earlier needs a ride to the hospital but it's 5am and i'm still drunk" face

name: utv
text: Yeah, there's a lot more going on in this strip than meets the eye. Namely that after hiring a known sex offender to mutilate his body in front of several children, Ray thought it was appropriate to celebrate by getting extremely fucked up.

name: wehavemagnums
text: Love panel 5. That pause as he gets himself together which totally undermines his performance. Brilliant.

name: phthoggos
text: I could go on forever about the writing in panel 5. Note especially the use of "or also."

name: closefriend
text: Why did I not ever realize before that Ray wears his shades to bed? He must really not want people to know he sold his eyes.

name: epicurus
text: A really amazing strip. If you think about it, Ray WAS insane to get Nice Pete to do that given the legal issues... or was he?

name: crinklebat
text: If I could rate this strip a million, I would. God, the timing.

name: featurelessvoid
text: This makes the previous strip so much funnier.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Oh boy! Seven dollars!

name: hollis
text: It's like a baby lamb!

name: chivalress
text: I have no idea what you mean by this, but by God, chubby.

name: hollis
text: Oh, reference to this strip. :)

name: tekende
text: You ARE seven dollars! YES YOU ARE!

name: soilentshuggah
text: One of the best phone excuses I've ever laid eyes on.

name: molesticide
text: this strip, and the one previous, are examples of the sum being greater than the combination of parts.  they complement each other well enough to raise both their scores.  this point has already been made.

name: toughasnails001
text: I think this is my favorite strip in the entireity of Achewood.

name: spinynorman
text:
I have lived panel 3.

If I disappear one day and the news has to post my photo it's likely the only photo they'll have on hand is like panel 3. That is the only face I can make anymore.

name: kledermans
text:
Ray's address changes. It's usually 11 Via Vera, not Via Verde. Also, in another one it was 811 Via Vera.


Whenever I see the 11, I first read it as "Il," like in Italian. Except "via" is feminine, so "Il via" doesn't make sense.

name: rowboat
text: Just take a deep breath, man. It's going to be OK.

name: deusoma
text: I'm pretty sure you could still find Spider-Man 2 in theatres in July Aught-Four, but yeah, he's grasping at straws.

name: epicurus
text: Panel 3 - we have been there.

name: dasilodavi
text: Did you know you have to get registered as a sex offender if you get caught peeing in a public place?  Imagine explaining that to the neighbors though, they're not exactly sympathetic.

name: hypoluxa
text:
There is something so great about sleeping Ray.
Quite cute, actuallly.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

-Ray-
It's Friday Night at Ray's!

-Philippe-
No New Ink Jet Printer :(
It's Super Windy!

-Lyle-
crappy sony sport radio
cousin in town

-Molly-
HYMEN ON BOARD

-Onstad-
That little stinker.

name: le_baron_noir
text:
Quote:
"Then I take that key for his new Mustang and stick it into his arm, like a needle."

I think I forget sometimes that Lyle is more than just a do-nothing bum. He's also a violent criminal.

name: rowboat
text:
Lyle's blog post can pretty well be summed up by one of Shane Macgowan's finest lines:

"I recall we took care of him one Sunday.
We got him out the back and we broke his fucking balls.
And maybe that was dreaming and maybe that was real,
but all I know's I left the place without a penny or fuck all."

I know Lyle's main guy is Lemmy, but I have to imagine that he and Shane would have plenty to talk about, as well.

name: tekende
text: Ray's blog mentions Hoegaarden. Hoegaarden is an excellent beer. Not as good as Stella, though.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
Ray's last sentence kills me every time i think about it.

i am thinking about it right now.


baha. hilarious.

name: aliiis
text: I also feel that the little motion lines as he flings the phone aside deserve an honourable mention. They are like The Last Word.

name: pursesnatcher
text: test

name: pursesnatcher
text: test

name: turnabout
text: why?

name: zanello
text: Best strip ever.

name: genequagmire
text: I love this comic.

name: riotdejaneiro
text: This strip is amazing beyond words. The look on Rays face in panel 3 makes it for me. Plus, "known sex offender"...I think Nice Pete is the most awesome psychopath there is. The things he does are horrifying yet incredibly amusing because he always has this LOOK on his face...amazing

name: treatyofparis
text: An all-time favorite. Bravo.

name: gorrioncita
text: one of the best strips, but what the hell is up with two molly blogs talking about hymens in a row.  what?  what??

name: ishuta
text: in the third panel ray is terrified he's about to be told he has diabetes
